mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CUSTOMS_CRM ( ID, CUSTOM_NO, CUSTOM_NAME, PIPING_TYPE_ID, CUSTOM_TYPE, TRADE, ADDRESS, SCALE, INVEST_STRUCT, EMPLOYEES, REGISITER_DATE, BOSS_NAME, ACT_POWER, LICENSE_NO, TAXATION_NO, DEAL_RANGE, IS_CREDIT, WARING_TIME, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipingTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investStruct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employees,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regisiterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCredit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{waringTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_CUSTOMS_CRM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE CUSTOMS_CRM
CUSTOM_NO = #{customNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_NAME = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIPING_TYPE_ID = #{pipingTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CUSTOM_TYPE = #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE = #{trade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCALE = #{scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVEST_STRUCT = #{investStruct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEES = #{employees,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REGISITER_DATE = #{regisiterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BOSS_NAME = #{bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACT_POWER = #{actPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXATION_NO = #{taxationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_RANGE = #{dealRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CREDIT = #{isCredit,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WARING_TIME = #{waringTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
